PatternLayout always logs messages in the default timezone.  PatternLayout needs
a method like "public void setTimeZone(String ID)" that would set the time zone
of SimpleDateFormat of PatternParser.

With this, my log4j.properties would look like:
...
log4j.appender.DL.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout 
log4j.appender.DL.layout.ConversionPattern=...
log4j.appender.DL.layout.timeZone=EST
